title: 如何关闭进出游戏提示 joined the game
author: qawszxedr
txt_content:
[size=13.63636302948px]如何关闭玩家进出的英文消息  
[size=13.63636302948px]玩家  joined the game.
[size=13.63636302948px]玩家 left the game.

[size=13.63636302948px]我翻遍AuthMe登陆插件和Essentials的配置都没找到关于这方面的命令，请问该如何做到？

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content:
ESS的config.yml里面
有如下两行

custom-join-message: "{USERNAME}加入了游戏"

custom-quit-message: "{USERNAME}离开了游戏"

可以自定义登陆登出的文字

或者使用这个
# Should players with permissions be able to join and part silently?
# You can control this with essentials.silentjoin and essentials.silentquit permissions if it is enabled.
# In addition, people with essentials.silentjoin.vanish will be vanished on join.
allow-silent-join-quit: true

true就是允许静默登录和登出，不过需要把essentials.silentjoin 和 essentials.silentquit权限附于玩家

replies.author: 914554688wyt
replies.txt_content:
ESS中有这样的配置哦

要是装了这一类登陆消息之类的插件那么就不会显示这个了（覆盖了）
